mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.PAR_PERSONAL_ID as parPersonalId, a.ISSUING_COUNTRY as issuingCountry, a.ID_CARD_TYPE as idCardType, a.ID_NUMBER as idNumber, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_IDENTITY( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , PAR_PERSONAL_ID , ISSUING_COUNTRY , ID_CARD_TYPE , ID_NUMBER , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{parPersonalId} , #{issuingCountry} , #{idCardType} , #{idNumber} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )

INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_IDENTITY
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
PAR_PERSONAL_ID ,
ISSUING_COUNTRY ,
ID_CARD_TYPE ,
ID_NUMBER ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE
#{id} ,
#{accountId} ,
#{parPersonalId} ,
#{issuingCountry} ,
#{idCardType} ,
#{idNumber} ,
#{createdBy} ,
#{createdDate} ,
#{updatedBy} ,
#{updatedDate}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_IDENTITY
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
PAR_PERSONAL_ID = #{parPersonalId} ,
ISSUING_COUNTRY = #{issuingCountry} ,
ID_CARD_TYPE = #{idCardType} ,
ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_IDENTITY( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , PAR_PERSONAL_ID , ISSUING_COUNTRY , ID_CARD_TYPE , ID_NUMBER , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.parPersonalId} , #{item.issuingCountry} , #{item.idCardType} , #{item.idNumber} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_IDENTITY SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , PAR_PERSONAL_ID = #{item.parPersonalId} , ISSUING_COUNTRY = #{item.issuingCountry} , ID_CARD_TYPE = #{item.idCardType} , ID_NUMBER = #{item.idNumber} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_IDENTITY SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , PAR_PERSONAL_ID = #{parPersonalId} , ISSUING_COUNTRY = #{issuingCountry} , ID_CARD_TYPE = #{idCardType} , ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PAR_IDENTITY a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ACCOUNT_PAR_IDENTITY a WHERE a.PAR_PERSONAL_ID = #{parPersonalId}
